channel.title: New subforum section?
channel.description: I was thinking, about how this forum has a community, of sorts. I'd like to get a vote, on wether we should introduce a place where new members can introduce themselves(besides IRC). What do you think of that kind of thread? Post your comments and replies here. It's not like it hasn't been done before either.

item.title: New subforum section?
item.dc:creator: @Tempest_Gaia Tempest Gaia
item.description:
@Tempest_Gaia wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:8, topic:371252”]Incorrect.

I was basing my statement of the already active community, new people join the overall community everyday. But I’m guessing very little are really bothered if some new person who they’ll most likely never see again joins.

Thus my original statement of, it’d be the same people posting there all the time, so it’s a waste. People usually join a runescape server community for either help on runescape servers or to post regarding runescape servers. This section would just be spammed with un needed posts and create extra work load for moderators.[/quote]
Firstly, there is no need to get so egotistical about this forum. It isn’t THAT big. Secondly, your point is simply based on another waste of time that has nothing to do with reality and productivity. Unless ofcourse, you consider runescape and important part of your life.
Lastly, not many people on here do alot of things you could classify as priority for moderators. There is always the occasional new user who doesn’t read a forums rules, but that honestly is no pressing matter. Besides, some members have merely taken it upon themselves to moderate others. Also you could always delete post counts, and create sections where people are allowed to set their logic on the backburner. (Oh, wait. Irc :P)

Read full topic

item.title: New subforum section?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Tempest Gaia, post:7, topic:371252”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=467336.msg3417161#msg3417161 date=1291189170]
It’s just be a waste of time, it’d just be the same people posting there.
[/quote]
Via this logic, forums are a waste of time. It’s just the same people posting. :D[/quote]

Incorrect.

I was basing my statement of the already active community, new people join the overall community everyday. But I’m guessing very little are really bothered if some new person who they’ll most likely never see again joins.

Thus my original statement of, it’d be the same people posting there all the time, so it’s a waste. People usually join a runescape server community for either help on runescape servers or to post regarding runescape servers. This section would just be spammed with un needed posts and create extra work load for moderators.

Read full topic

item.title: New subforum section?

It’s just be a waste of time, it’d just be the same people posting there.
